Name: Ameliza
description:
Ameliza is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with one child.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries like canned goods, noodles, and personal care products.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like farming rice and pig fattening.

Ameliza dreams that one day, she will be able to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.
